Question
========

Which one of the following statements about `git` (and/or GitHub) is **false**? 

Answerlist
----------
* `git` is a [version control](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Version_control) system that allows you to track changes in the history of a software project.
* GitHub is a website that provides hosting services for `git` projects. 
* The only way to use `git` is through the [command line](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Command-line_interface) (or [UNIX shell](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_shell)).
* Many professional data scientists use `git` and GitHub to collaborate on software projects. 




Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* This statement is true. 
* This statement is true. 
* This statement is false, there are several GUIs for `git`. 
* This statement is true.
